DOC.brief_summary: This study is to evaluate the safety of SU011248 (Sunitinib/Sutent) in combination with docetaxel in patients with metastatic or locally recurrent breast cancer who have not received chemotherapy treatment in the advanced disease setting.
DOC.brief_title: Study Of SU011248 In Combination With Docetaxel In Patients With Metastatic Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Breast cancer with evidence of unresectable, locally recurrent or metastatic disease Candidate for treatment with docetaxel Prior chemotherapy in the advanced disease setting Inflammatory breast cancer HER2 positive disease
